Module contents¶

Generic dataset class

class cortex.datasets.BasicDataset(data, distributions=None, labels='label', name=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: cortex.datasets.Dataset

Dataset with numpy arrays as inputs. No visualization available.

Arrays must be a dictionary of name/numpy array key/value pairs.

cortex.datasets.load_data(dataset=None, train_batch_size=None, valid_batch_size=None, test_batch_size=None, resolve_dataset=None, **dataset_args)¶

Load dataset with a predefined split.

For these datasets, train/valid/test split has already been made. For the batch sizes, if any are None, the corresponding dataset will also be None.

Parameters:
  • dataset – str
  • train_batch_size (Optional) –
  • valid_batch_size (Optional) –
  • test_batch_size (Optional) –
Returns:

train, valid, test Dataset objects.
cortex.datasets.load_data_split(C, idx=None, dataset=None, **dataset_args)¶

Load dataset and split. :param idx: (Optional) list of list of int. Indices for train/valid/test

datasets.
Returns:train, valid, test Dataset objects. idx: Indices for if split is created.
cortex.datasets.make_datasets(C, split=[0.7, 0.2, 0.1], idx=None, train_batch_size=None, valid_batch_size=None, test_batch_size=None, **dataset_args)¶

Constructs train/valid/test datasets with idx or split.

If idx is None, use split ratios to create indices.

Parameters:
  • C – Dataset class.
  • split – (Optional) list of float. Split ratios over total.
  • idx – (Optional) list of list of int. Indices for train/valid/test datasets.
  • train_batch_size (Optional) –
  • valid_batch_size (Optional) –
  • test_batch_size (Optional) –
Returns:

train, valid, test Dataset objects. idx: Indices for if split is created.
